name: Morris: Mortality Rate
description:
Morris: Mortality Rate

An isometric dungeon crawler shoot 'em up game all about strategic decision making and fast paced gunplay. Take control of the teddy bear Morris and battle your way through a huge factory by surviving through a sprawling series of rooms filled with dangerous robot enemies. Improve your arsenal of weapons and your physical attributes along the way to aid you in your battle against the evil AI terrorizing humanity.

The game has support both for keyboard & mouse and gamepad!

We at What The Dog Doin' studios, a group of game development students from Playgroundsquad in Sweden, proudly present our first game project. You can read more about the team  here.

The team behind Morris:

In order from left to right, top to bottom: Oskar Lindahl, Victor Fröjd, Felicia Lindgren, Ellinor Levin, André Valand, Anton Winqvist, David Bern, Linus Jernström and Hari Murali.
